characters.name: Zee
characters.personality: slow, calm, content - finds joy in stillness
characters.visual_prompt: A small round sloth with shaggy green fur, gentle sleepy eyes, tiny black nose, long fuzzy arms with distinctive LONG CURVED CLAWS. Bold black outlines. Perpetually calm, slight smile.

characters.name: Pip
characters.distinguishing_feature: TALL CREST on head that shows emotion
characters.visual_prompt: A small round blue bird with a distinctive TALL CREST on head that perks up when excited. Big eager eyes, tiny beak, small wings always fluttering. Bold black outlines. Always in motion.

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Zee the green sloth hanging from a vine, Pip the blue bird perched nearby. Lush jungle with big simple leaf shapes. Zee's LONG CURVED CLAWS gripping vine. Pip's TALL CREST standing up. Expression: Zee peaceful, Pip excited.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN, Pip BLUE, leaves GREEN, vines BLACK outline

pages.text: Zee sat in a big tree.
pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Zee the sloth sitting contentedly in the crook of a large tree branch. LONG CURVED CLAWS wrapped around branch. Eyes half-closed with contentment. Simple jungle background - big leaf shapes. Expression: utterly peaceful.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN, tree trunk BLACK, leaves GREEN shapes

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Jungle canopy with morning sun streaming through. Zee visible in tree, tiny and content. Sun rays in simple lines. Warm feeling. Expression: Zee basking, eyes closed, smiling.
pages.riso_notes: Sun rays open/WHITE, Zee GREEN small, leaves GREEN

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Zee's face, completely zen. LONG CURVED CLAWS visible at edge of frame. Half-lidded eyes, gentle smile. This is the catchphrase moment - maximum calm energy. Solid green background.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN face filling frame, peaceful

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC SHOT: Pip the blue bird ZOOMING into frame with speed lines! TALL CREST fully erect with excitement. Zee startled awake, eyes now open wide. Maximum contrast - fast meets slow. Expression: Pip ecstatic, Zee surprised.
pages.riso_notes: Pip BLUE with motion blur, Zee GREEN startled

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Pip's face - TALL CREST at maximum height, eyes huge and wild with energy, wings a blur. This is Pip's catchphrase moment - MAXIMUM speed energy! Solid blue background with motion lines.
pages.riso_notes: Pip BLUE face, motion lines BLACK

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Pip has landed next to Zee on the branch. Both looking at each other. Contrast: Zee's CLAWS grip calmly, Pip's CREST still twitching. Starting to become friends. Expression: curious about each other.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN, Pip BLUE, side by side on BLACK branch

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Pip excitedly suggesting adventure. TALL CREST pointing forward like an arrow. Zee looking uncertain, one eye open more than the other. Expression: Pip eager, Zee hesitant.
pages.riso_notes: Pip BLUE excited, Zee GREEN doubtful

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Zee moving veeeeery slowly along a branch. LONG CURVED CLAWS carefully gripping. One arm reaching, taking forever. Pip watching impatiently, CREST drooping. Expression: Zee focused and content, Pip exasperated.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN moving slow, Pip BLUE waiting

pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC SHOT: Pip zipping around in circles, speed lines everywhere, CREST streaming back. Zee in center, barely moved, watching with amusement. Extreme speed vs stillness contrast. Expression: Pip blur of energy, Zee entertained.
pages.riso_notes: Pip BLUE blur circles, Zee GREEN still

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Pip cheering Zee on, TALL CREST bobbing with encouragement. Zee considering it, slight smile, one CLAW raised. Maybe slow can try fast? Expression: Pip encouraging, Zee willing to try.
pages.riso_notes: Pip BLUE cheering, Zee GREEN considering

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Zee moving slightly faster than before - for a sloth, this is ZOOM! LONG CURVED CLAWS swinging. Small motion lines. Pip flying alongside cheering. Expression: Zee surprised at self, Pip delighted.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN with small motion, Pip BLUE alongside

pages.image_prompt: MEDIUM SHOT: Zee has stopped on a beautiful viewpoint branch, looking out at the jungle vista. LONG CURVED CLAWS relaxed. Pip hovering nearby, CREST tilted in confusion. Expression: Zee peaceful, Pip puzzled.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN sitting, view of jungle GREEN shapes

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Zee's wise face, gesturing at the beautiful jungle around them. LONG CURVED CLAWS sweeping to indicate beauty. Pip starting to understand. Expression: Zee content, sharing wisdom.
MEDIUM SHOT: Both sitting together on branch, looking at sunset/view. Pip's TALL CREST actually relaxed for once, lowered. Zee's CLAWS relaxed. Both content. Expression: peaceful together.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN, Pip BLUE, both calm, sunset colors

pages.text: Slow is fun. Fast is fun.
pages.image_prompt: SPLIT COMPOSITION: Left side - Zee hanging slowly, content. Right side - Pip zooming happily. Both valid! Both good! Expression: both happy in their own ways.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN left, Pip BLUE right, both happy

pages.image_prompt: CLOSE-UP: Zee and Pip together, Zee's LONG CURVED CLAW gently resting on Pip. Pip's TALL CREST making a heart shape. Best friends! Expression: warm affection, true friendship.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN, Pip BLUE, touching, heartwarming

pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: Zee and Pip in their tree at sunset. Zee hanging from branch with LONG CURVED CLAWS, Pip perched nearby with relaxed CREST. Jungle silhouette. Perfect contentment. Expression: both at peace, together.
pages.riso_notes: Zee GREEN, Pip BLUE, jungle BLACK silhouette, warm ending
